        "type": "nested",

                "type": "nested",

                    "0": {
                        "type": "unchanged",
                        "key": "key",
                        "value": "value"
                    },
                    "2": {
                        "type": "added",
                        "key": "ops",
                        "value": "vops"
                    }
                }
            },
            "4": {
                "type": "added",
                "key": "follow",
                "value": false
            },
            "7": {
                "type": "added",
                "key": "setting4",
                "value": "blah blah"
            },
            "8": {
                "type": "added",
                "key": "setting5",
                "value": {
                    "key5": "value5"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "1": {
        "type": "nested",
        "key": "group1",
        "children": [
            {
                "type": "changed",
                "key": "baz",
                "newValue": "bars",
                "oldValue": "bas"
            },
            {
                "type": "unchanged",
                "key": "foo",
                "value": "bar"

                "type": "changed",
                "key": "nest",
                "newValue": "str",
                "oldValue": {
                    "key": "value"
                }
            }
        ]
    },

        "type": "removed",

        }
